Angela Kyerematen-Jimoh bụ onye ndu ọchụnta ego Ghana na onye ndu Microsoft Strategic Partnership for Africa
Tupu ịbanye na Microsoft, ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa / onye isi mpaghara maka IBM North, East na West Africa site na 2020 ruo 2021
Ọ bụbu onye isi nchịkwa obodo maka Ghana
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ ghọrọ onye ntụzi obodo nke IBM n'Afrịka na onye Afrịka mbụ na nwanyị a ga-ahọpụta onye isi njikwa mpaghara.
Angela nwere BA na Marketing na French
Ọ bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Harvard Business School na London Guildhall College
Ọ bụkwa nwa akwụkwọ ochie nke Wesley Girls' High School na Achimota School na Ghana.
